column4: under alsa, input source, my built in mic appears as front mic

double click the small speaker un the notification area, then click on edit>preferences, and check mark input source and capture, then new tabs will apear, click on the "options" tab, and select your front mic as input, then select the "recording" tab and unmute capture and turn the input source all the way up
you followed my instructions avobe? thats how i got mine working
does the mic works w other software?
In WIndows, yes lol. Let me try you instructions, didn't see it
Audacity says: Error while opening sound device. Please check the input device settings and the project sample rate.
if you already did my instructions no problem, open auditacy , then edit>preferences, AUDIO I/O and change the input source to alsa mic
